notes_translated.fr: Ce fichier contient des polygones délimitant les jardins communautaires. Un jardin communautaire est un jardin potager composé de plusieurs jardinets, chacun étant attribué et cultivé par un citoyen ou une famille.
notes_translated.en-t-fr:
This file contains polygons delineating community gardens. A community garden is a vegetable garden consisting of several gardens, each of which is allocated and cultivated by a citizen or family.  
  
  **This third party metadata element was translated using an automated translation tool (Amazon Translate).**
